Title: Establishes the credit reporting rights outreach program
Summary: Establishes the credit reporting rights outreach program to educate the public about the rights and obligations of citizens of the state of New York under the federal Equal Credit Opportunity Act; requires an annual report concerning the operation of such program.
LawCode: Add Art 7 ยง701, Fin Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, in relation to a public education program about the rights of consumers
